Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: David A. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I have tried using several of these and have had nothing but probelms... the wire is very brittle and the barrel connector fails to make a proper connection.  you are better off buying the screw terminal type and using your own wire.

Reviews.Title: exactly what I was looking for - great fit with the "GW Security CCTV Female Power Pigtail Female Plug Lead"
Reviews.Author: Jeff Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I used this with the "GW Security CCTV Female Power Pigtail Female Plug Lead" and they are a perfect. They went together nicely and was exactly what I needed for my project that involved 12v LED strips.I would like note that this is NOT all black, it has a red AND black wire - the pictures appears all black, but the product I got had a red and black wire. The female product as I mentioned is ALL black.female connector:http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005Q0A0GI/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_8
